newsitem.title: USA: Ford sets unchanged Q4 quarterly dividend.
newsitem.headline: Ford sets unchanged Q4 quarterly dividend.

text.p: Ford Motor Co said Thursday its board of directors declared a fourth quarter dividend of $0.385 a share on Class B and common stock, unchanged from the prior payout.

The board also declared a dividend of $1.05 a share on depositary shares representing the firm's Series A Cumulative Convertible Preferred Stock, and a dividend of 51.5625 cents a share on depositary shares representing its Series B Cumulative Preferred Stock.
The dividend on Series A Preferred Stock equals the quarterly amount of the annual cumulative dividend of $4.20 per depostary share.
The dividend on Series B Preferred Stock equals the quarterly amount of the annual cumulative dividend of $2.0625 per depositary share.
Fourth quarter dividends are payable December 2, 1996, to shareholders of record on November 1, 1996.
